# orientation enumeration

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/orientation>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:08:04.117055

---

Used by`widget` orientation modes.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Enumerators

The `orientation` enumeration includes the following enumerators:

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `Horizontal` | Orient `widget`s from left to right. |
| `Vertical` | Orient `widget`s from top to bottom. |
